languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, почтенные офицеры служб, обеспечивающих чистоту и порядок на мостике, поручили мне обратиться к вам с нижайшим прошением — освободить почтенного Соломона Антара от должности поломоя".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, почтенные офицеры служб, обеспечивающих чистоту и порядок на мостике, поручили мне обратиться к вам с нижайшим прошением — освободить почтенного Соломона Антара от должности поломоя".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die geschätzten Offiziere, die für die Sauberkeit und Ordnung auf der Brücke verantwortlich sind, haben mich angewiesen, Euch in aller Demut zu bitten ... den geschätzten Solomorne Anthar von seinem Posten als Deckreiniger zu entbinden."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die geschätzten Offiziere, die für die Sauberkeit und Ordnung auf der Brücke verantwortlich sind, haben mich angewiesen, Euch in aller Demut zu bitten ... den geschätzten Solomorne Anthar von seinem Posten als Deckreiniger zu entbinden."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, les honorables officiers chargés d'assurer la propreté et l'ordre sur la passerelle m'ont demandé de vous soumettre leur humble requête : relever l'honorable Solomorne Anthar de ses fonctions de nettoyeur de pont. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, les honorables officiers chargés d'assurer la propreté et l'ordre sur la passerelle m'ont demandé de vous soumettre leur humble requête : relever l'honorable Solomorne Anthar de ses fonctions de nettoyeur de pont. »

languages.text: 「閣下、ブリッジの清掃と秩序の維持を任されている尊敬すべき士官たちより、つつしんでお願いを申し上げるよう指示を受けました。尊敬すべきソロモーン・アンサール様をデッキ清掃係の任からお外しいただけませんでしょうか、と」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、ブリッジの清掃と秩序の維持を任されている尊敬すべき士官たちより、つつしんでお願いを申し上げるよう指示を受けました。尊敬すべきソロモーン・アンサール様をデッキ清掃係の任からお外しいただけませんでしょうか、と」

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, los oficiales responsables de mantener la higiene y el orden en el puente me han pedido que le transmita una humilde solicitud: releve al estimado Solomorne Anthar de su puesto fregando cubiertas».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, los oficiales responsables de mantener la higiene y el orden en el puente me han pedido que le transmita una humilde solicitud: releve al estimado Solomorne Anthar de su puesto fregando cubiertas».

languages.text: “舰长大人，好几位负责保障舰桥清洁与秩序的军官找到了我，希望我能向您传达他们的卑微请求。他们希望您能解除尊敬的索罗蒙·安萨在清洗甲板方面的职务。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，好几位负责保障舰桥清洁与秩序的军官找到了我，希望我能向您传达他们的卑微请求。他们希望您能解除尊敬的索罗蒙·安萨在清洗甲板方面的职务。”

languages.text: "Köprüde temizlik ve düzeni sağlamakla görevli saygıdeğer subaylar, benden naçizane ricalarını size iletmemi istediler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Saygıdeğer Solomorne Anthar'ı güverte temizliği görevinden almanızı rica ediyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the esteemed officers responsible for ensuring cleanliness and order on the bridge have instructed me to submit their humble request to you — to relieve the esteemed Solomorne Anthar of his post as a deck swab."

traits.locale_text: "Sayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, köprüde temizlik ve düzeni sağlamakla görevli saygıdeğer subaylar, benden naçizane ricalarını size iletmemi istediler: Saygıdeğer Solomorne Anthar'ı güverte temizliği görevinden almanızı rica ediyorlar."
